description:
After failing time after time Kidoly is finally kicked out by Demon King Azul.  In an attempt to restore his reputation, Kidoly decides to resurrect the Black Knight GeBulg! GeBulg then evolves into the Knight of Darkness intends to defeat Fire!  It’s a battle of light and dark between the White Knight Cúchulainn, formerly Warrior Tanta, and GeBulg!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Knight of Darkness Versus the Knight of Light
